properties.Problem to be addressed /Recommendations: Soil erosion of land on both sides(750m). Recommend 1. Areca nut rows and vetiver grass with pepper or betel cultivation strip of 2m wide and 750m long. 2. To construct (2mx2mx1m) four SABO- boulder dams across the stream .
